entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bécancour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
